Title: Academics - Institute of Pharmacy

Institute of Pharmacy offers undergraduate and postgraduate programmes in addition to doctoral programme in various branches of Pharmaceutical Sciences.
Programme that has been designed to enhance the skills of the students in terms of development of professional identity, critical thinking, and lifelong learning.
Nirma University started Doctoral Programmes in the year 2003. The PhD Programmes offered in the University are by the Faculty of Technology & Engineering..
The University has Postdoctoral Fellowship Programme with an aim to identify active researchers and to provide them a platform to carry out research in frontier areas.
In addition to imparting knowledge to the students, the faculty contributes to research through funded projects, industrial projects, consultancy, etc to formulate novel formulations.
